Name: Riot of the numbers
About the game: Join the world of computer bits where only 0 and 1 are used but the other numbers felt left behind and they started a riot. You play as alpha 0 bit and try to reunite with alpha 1 bit to defeat the riot. Solve equations on each level while doing platforming to reach the exit. Fight bosses , play together with alpha 1 bit and try to reestablish the order.
